title: Energy - Total K of a two-sphere-rod system

content.question: What is the total kinetic energy of the two-sphere-rod system at the instant shown in Figure <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"> <mn>2</mn> </math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="one half m sub 0, end sub, times v sub 0, end sub, squared, minus one half m sub 0, end sub, times g h" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <msub> <mi>m</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> <msubsup> <mi>v</mi> <mn>0</mn> <mn>2</mn> </msubsup> <mo>−</mo> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <msub> <mi>m</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> <mi>g</mi> <mi>h</mi> </mstyle> </math>
